snippet: President Obama's campaign put out a video appeal from Anna Wintour, the editor in chief of Vogue magazine, the same day a grim jobs report was released.
abstract: President Obama's campaign put out a video appeal from Anna Wintour, the editor in chief of Vogue magazine, the same day a grim jobs report was released.

headline.main: After a Day of Bad Economic News, an Invitation From Anna Wintour
headline.print_headline: Oops Dept.: An Ill-Timed Dinner Offer
